description: Brazil vs. The Good Ole USA! From the sizzling hot tropics of coastal Brazil comes Carlo Cox, a Kristen Bjorn-style sex god with a chest that has hearts pounding from coast to coast. Pair this hairy muscle-god with Raging Stallion's own chisel-cut Tony Scalia (star of The Dirty Director) and you have the ingredients for a muscle-sex explosion that will leave you screaming. Fucking has never been filmed so well ? Watch as Carlo's beer-can thick dick slips and slides in and out of Tony's hard ass in position after amazing position. Cum flies as this international pairing climaxes right before your eyes!
title: Take It Like A Man, Scene #01
